website_summaries.verdict: Those desiring a bed bug and dust mite protector will find their match in this versatile option.
pros: Zipper closure reinforced by a hook-and-loop tape strip creates a cover that keeps zipper from accidentally opening in the middle of the night
Protects against bed bugs, dust mites, and fluids
cons: Sounds like plastic cover when moving

customer_reviews.title: Awful, built for children
customer_reviews.text: This mattress-protector seems designed for children having bed-wetting problems. If you're an adult who perhaps wishes to protect your mattress from bedbugs/fleas/spilled drinks/etc., forget it. This thing is lined with plastic, so you have a constant, loud rustling from it, not to mention intense body-heat/sweat bouncing back at you non-stop. Not sure what adult could tolerate sleeping on this, but I returned it immediately, and purchased a different brand (not sure why I strayed in the first place, my fault for trusting reviews). Check out the photo and notice the sheen on the lining. Look comfy?
customer_reviews.author: Dara C

customer_reviews.title: Not waterprooof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. My daughter had an accident the first day I put this on her brand new mattress and the pee went right through the mattress protector. Other than that I like the product but the whole reason I bought it was to have a waterproof protector and that it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not water proof. Dog puked on bed and it went through.
customer_reviews.author: Alon

customer_reviews.title: Will definitly order another.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT & fast shipping! My husband is the general manager of a well know pest control company that treats bed bug infestations and they supply matress covers (that are NOT cheap and run his company $60+) to thier customers after treatments. He was the one who put this cover on our matress and was very impressed with quality and price. He even made mention that he had to UNZIP the cover to let the air out so you know its completely sealed at the seems!
customer_reviews.author: B.Skattebo

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to get onto the mattress and fits our deep ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased due to having a significant dust mite allergy. It was easy to get onto the mattress and fits our deep 13" mattress with material to spare. It doesn't feel like plastic or vinyl and we can't even tell it's on the bed. It has made a significant impact with my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Utopía Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Everything is awsome, servicing Orlando FL for bed bugs these covers has helped alot. You've got my business for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Return of Bed Bugs Due to Hole in Seam
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed bug encasement to use on our mattress after our home was treated for bed bugs. At the beginning of the month, I began noticing bites on my arms and at the time, didn’t understand why. We ruled out re-infestation and when we had a pest control company come back out, we detected this hole in the encasement. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: The Gunns

customer_reviews.title: Inspect it well before deciding to keep it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not one who likes to leave bad reviews on things that I purchase, I will try to make it work no matter what before I leave a review. But this one I could not do anything with it, it came out of the package ripped I touched it it ripped ,whatever I was trying to do it ripped I could not even tape it to make it work. for me it was just cheaply-made or I received the one that was maybe 50 years old out of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't protect your mattress, it will become dirty and infested with all sorts of things from bed bugs to microbes (that you breathe in while sleeping.) One of these and your mattress investment will be protected (as will be your health) and you will get much more mileage out of your mattress investment. I like this brand/model best because it's not just a cover. The materials seal out dirt and bugs. It's something like a plastic but feels more like cloth. This is my second one for a second mattress purchase. I highly recommend getting one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Evening Iris

customer_reviews.title: Makes noise and fits good.
customer_reviews.text: We thought we had bed bugs, but it wasn't the case. We ended up using these anyways and still have them on our bed. It does make noise, but it's not too bad. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: amf

customer_reviews.title: So I'm disappointed. It also makes noise when moving around
customer_reviews.text: It is way bigger than expected. So I'm disappointed. It also makes noise when moving around. I should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Milka

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Price was good. High reviews attracted me to the product. In three different instances this cover was NOT waterproof (3 different diaper leaks from a preschooler). Now my almost new mattress smells like pee. Very disappointed. Even though the encasement was nice for allergens it didn't do the overall job.
customer_reviews.author: BlueLikeJazz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible plastic crinkling noise when you shift in bed, makes the bed terribly hot during the night, and worse of all I have to pay the shipping cost to return it is twice what I paid to ship it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.  Does not protect against bed bugs.
customer_reviews.text: If you can see my photo then you can see how loosely the zipper is sewn on. This leaves plenty of room for nymphs and possibly larger bugs to get out. A few days after putting the cover on the mattress I found several nymphs on the outside near the zipper. Frustrating when a product does not live up to its requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Plitt

customer_reviews.title: Expensive!! Not Bedbug Proof !! DO NOT BUY!! TRUST ME
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 metress cover (3 twin ($20 each) and 2 full size ($30 each)) just because it says it’s bedbugproof. I found bedbug in the cover within a week. This metresscover invite bed bugs to sit in the corner and in the zipper. Very bad quality. Don’t mention it’s bedbug proof when it’s not. DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: So far no bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a townhouse that we later found had bedbugs. After using bed bug killer, washing everything (bedding, stuffed animals, clothes, pillows, and blankets) and vacuuming, we put these on all mattresses and box springs. It's been several months and we haven't had any bed bug issues.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa B.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mattress Cover I Have Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: This product has more than exceeded my expectations. It fits my full size mattress beautifully. The materials used in its construction are of the highest quality. There is even a Velcro tab to cover the zipper pull. The material is soft and yet durable and I can see it will probably was beautifully. The material does not have a 'crackling' sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. GroveTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Kinda making me hot, but helping with allergies
customer_reviews.text: Fit over the 12-14” mattress (can’t remember height of it). Recommends 2 people to put it on, I did it with one and it was easy. Have had it 5 days—3 out of 5 I have woke up very hot and sweaty on the mattress cover side, however I can’t imagine there is a cover that’s hypoallerginic that doesn’t make you hot. It has to trap the dust and what not inside the mattress so it doesn’t breathe. My allergies improved close to half since I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Oscarthegrouch1984

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seal properly against bugs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress encasement to isolate a bedbug-infested mattress. The zipper closure has a velcro tab to go over it and theoretically seal it. It did not hold up past 6months. I am fairly upset, because the seal must last over 18mo in order to be effective. I have taped over it with clear tape as a stop gap measure while a new encasement is on order. But you can see by the proliferation if bloodmeal that this is where they were escaping.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it would feel like plastic, but it doesn't. My friend owns tons of pets and one day they slept over... The following week, I noticed small bug bites and became paranoid that they brought fleas or bed bugs into my home. I poured a bunch of diatomaceous earth around the house and window sills -- then bought these covers. Luckily I haven't had a problem since ((knocks on wood))
customer_reviews.author: BAE

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS. BUGS AND STAINS EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Stains go right through. We had this for a long time now. We thought we were bed bug free. Randomly we would see a big but no trace of them anywhere else.... FINALLY we realized the bugs had gotten smart and were slipping and out of the mattress encasement. It does nothing for your mattress.. NOTHING. My bed is full of stains and bugs. This is not worth a penny!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stops bugs from entering the Matters
customer_reviews.text: One of the bad experience I had with this Bed Bug cover. I used this for almost 1 year and I noticed some Bed Bugs in my room. I was confident that I might not have any bugs in my Mattress as I have this Bed Bug Cover, but I was shocked when I unzipped the cover. It failed to stop the bugs to enter. I left with once choice to through Mattress in Trash. :(
customer_reviews.author: Surya

customer_reviews.title: Good for bedbugs.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help control bedbugs, and it is far easier to spray or dust this here bag, than it is to spray inside nook and crevice on a mattress. I read some people complained of bedbugs sneaking out of zipper? that has not happened, and the velcro tab was good idea. I had no trouble inserting my mattress, and i did add a generous lot of diatomacous earth powder into the bag prior to zipping it closed, as well as sprayed the zipper well with Bedlam poison, just to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer33333

customer_reviews.title: Prevent Bed Bugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these specifically for bed bugs. I put them on all the mattresses at my house before doing a heat treatment. My exterminated was impressed by their quality and amazed by how affordable they were. It's been several months, and I haven't had any more bugs. I fully intend on using the covers for every mattress in the future. These are also waterproof, although I don't recommend them for that purpose since they're a little hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mattress encasement. Years ago I brought bedbugs home from a hotel, and I learned then how important it is to protect your own mattress. So when I recently replaced my mattress I got a new encasement and selected this one. I really like the breathable fabric and the Velcro that covers the end of the zipper. I wish the zipper were longer and went around two sides so it would be easier to put on, but I decided not to knock off a star for that. Just be aware that it would be a lot easier to put on if you have help.
customer_reviews.author: Maud

customer_reviews.title: Loud Sound
customer_reviews.text: The material itself is very nice and is pretty durable, it fit around my bed pretty nicely with some room for a mattress topper to go underneath it. However I gave it about three stars overall because it is very noisy and loud. You can hear the crinkling if you move around at night, but if you don't move then I think you'll be fine. It only make a crinkling noise when you go to sit/lay on it and move around on it.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Must for new mattress purchases!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago with my old mattress for about $60 at the furniture store. I was so happy to find basically the same kind for a fraction of the cost! This protector is a must! It goes on easy, even with just one person! It zips the entire mattress up for no bugs, dirt or liquids to penetrate mattress. Our little one is always climbing on the bed with leaky sippy cups, the cover protects your mattress. If you have a warranty on a mattress, I would recommend this cover! It has a cool feeling to it, but it will get dirty easily because it is white unless you put fitted sheets over it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product lies and says that it is waterproof and I bought a lot of them for this reason. One of my animals had an accident and it went through 4 blankets and two mattress pads. There were multiple layers of protection, the last one being this mattress pad and the mattress was still soaked. Don’t lie and say your product is waterproof when it is not. I relied on this and it failed the test rather quickly. I would recommend choosing another product that is ACTUALLY waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kira McCall

customer_reviews.title: Ripped seam
customer_reviews.text: The mattress encasement looks nice and doesn’t hve an odor but there was a tear in the sram.
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

customer_reviews.title: A little big and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for a bunk bed with 5in thick memory foam mattresses. They were easy to put on, but a little baggy on the mattresses (not that I care, but maybe someone else will). A little loud when the kids move on them. Been using them for almost a week and no issues so far so I'm satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for kids that pee the bed
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought one by accident thinking it was just a child's bed pee cover (not fully reading).. turns out it's for bed bugs... Hahaha but it actually works to keep the pee off the mattress... I've had it for a year, washed it, dried it, reused it... not one rip.. and like all children mine jump on the bed, fight, throw tantrums and still not one problem.. i fully recommend for the purposes I've used it for.. this however isn't a review on the bed bug side of things as that doesn't pertain to my specific use..
customer_reviews.author: Duck Duckerton

customer_reviews.title: Stupid
customer_reviews.text: This is the crappiest bed protector ever. Yes it is waterproof and covers my mattress completely but guess what. It doesnt allow your sheets to stay on at all. It isnt snug against your bed. It is loose and baggy and i have a 12in mattress. If i could semd it back i would but guess what. I cant. Been too long. But it is crap
customer_reviews.author: MamaBearPotato

customer_reviews.title: Off-gassing
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is good, except for the off-gassing. I wasn't expecting that as ones I've purchased from another company that also used polyurethane as a backing did not have that problem. I'm chemically sensitive and got the mattress encasement specifically to protect myself from off-gassing...so...the jury is still out. It's next to the airfilter and if it clears up in a few days I'll keep it. I've had it for for 4 or 5 days so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if you have bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. one for my mattress and one for my box springs. We had a minor bed bug infestation. We got a lot of products to spray and clean the room and finished it up with this product and it worked great... at first! It’s been two months about and the bed bugs have come up through the zipper and reinfected my home. Going with the professionals which I should have done to begin with
customer_reviews.author: Claire Benningstone

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to sweat
customer_reviews.text: As a grown woman, i bought it just to protect my mattress from getting dirty, to prevent bed bugs and incase I have a leak during my monthlys. Havent had one of those just yet, but I already know that it's proper resistant..... because I sweat bullets when the temp is even slightly warmer than mild and I see the body shaped watermark on the mattress cover but the mattress looks clean. Idk if there's a mattress protector that doesn't make the bed hot but my search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why it's rated so high
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these that I put on new mattresses for my young girls. After several months both mattress have multiple stains. They are a PIA to put on the mattress. Disapointed in the product and the reviewers on this one. I think perhaps the covers slow down the transfer of fluid but if your children wet themselves and don't wake up and immediately tell you.....you got a stain on your hands. I could look past the whole "putting a sock on a mattress" thing if they actually worked but now I'm just mad I had to struggle with them after every wetting incident AND they didn't work. ARRRGGGHH!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: A long term investment
customer_reviews.text: I ran into a good deal of trouble with the bed bugs and eventually had to throw my mattress. When I bought a new one, I wanted a good cover for it to prevent further infestation and boy did it work. This mattress cover works superbly. Fortunately, I got rid of the bed bugs fast, but this encasement is still going well even after a year. Not only it works for bugs, but it also is a water repellant and has prevented water spills to reach my mattress so may times. Would definitely recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Aayush Sisodia

customer_reviews.title: Swoosh swoosh
customer_reviews.text: I’m really thinking about taking this off my mattress and returning it. Been sleeping on it for a few days and I swear it feels like sleeping on a toddler bed. This cover makes a plastic swooshing noise when you move around and it’s loud. Its probably good at keeping the mattress safe but I’ll never know because I can’t get over the swooshing. On the plus side, it fit my 14in king mattress just fine. It wasn’t too big and was easy to put on. I did it by myself. It was well sewn and put together. I will try a different brand tho for a quiet cover like I had before getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cintia L.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Affordable, & Does The Job!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a mattress cover this is the only one you will need! I am an avid review reader, and luckily was in between this product and one more. Long story short this was what I bought and am glad. This is beyond durable, and extremely easy to put on your mattress. We have slung this thing around cleaning under our bed and the material is strong enough to not rip, tear, or having any issues with breakage at all. This will be the perfect fit if you need a mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: The Romanini’s

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do any of the things I was worried it would do - make a vinyl noise, be hot, feel uncomfortable. If anything it enhanced my sleeping experience. I haven't heard it once, it doesn't warm me up and it doesn't wrinkle. It's great, however did I live without it?? And there's a bedbug in there, he's a goner.
customer_reviews.author: Claire G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof.  Easy to install.  Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I waited to write the review until I really tested it out. Easy to put on. Perfect fit. No leaks. . No mess in the bed. Better than the department store brand. Perfect for my 3 year old. He has accidents. I ordered 3 more a month after I fell in love to make sure I always have available for him. A must have and no leaks. Great value for the money. Would order again. Fast shipping and they work amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shippy

customer_reviews.title: worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased one from Target but took it back once I received this. The one from Target was twice as much. This one was easy to install. I tried to do it the way they recommended but that didn't work with my heavy King mattress so what I did was lay the mattress halfway on the bed. Once the end was hanging off I slid the case on then stood the mattress up and pulled the case up. It pulled right up and zipped easily. It was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Update: there is no waterproof abilities for this. I wash and dry as recommended and my son wets right through to the mattress with several layers of protection on top of this cover. The cover wasn’t as thick as I would have liked or how it appeared online. Other reviewers described a microfiber cover and mine appeared to be “plastic” all over. It was also a lot bigger then my twin mattress. I may look into another cover or add some type of pad to fill in the empty space. As for the waterproof nature or bed bug prevention, I cannot speak towards its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: bnicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my memory foam bed for several years now and it's by far my most prized investment! I've gone through several bed covers. This one looks and feels the most durable. I'm sure there better covers out there but this was a bargain for the quality. My bed is about 15 inches high. This cover slides on smoothly with little slack. No noticable odor that I could tell of. It's not noisy either. I tend to get night sweats sometimes and this definitely helps me preserve my bed. This review was done several months after owning it. So, I'd recommend this cover and I'd repurchase if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Using this in addition to changing bedding once a week and spraying with EcoRaider bed bug killer have significantly reduced bed bites. We aren't certain we have bed bugs due to not seeing anything, but are thankful this has helped the unknown bites we get in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Harristay

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: While this mattress protector is great for keeping the bed bugs out/off, it is NOT WATERPROOF! I have 2 dogs and one is prone to accidents. I had just recently purchased a new mattress and wanted to keep it bug and pee free. My dog peed on my bed and it went straight through to my brand new matress! I had to spot clean the mattress cover and mattress itself. Not something I want to come home to after a busy night at work! I would not recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fits - And Not Just a Fitted Sheet - Full Encasement of Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated when reading the directions saying you needed two people to install. I did it by myself. My son has a small full size mattress and I had put one of those egg carton pads on top that was made for a queen size bed. I was able to put this cover around them both and it looks A LOT better being completely encased. I previously purchased the fitted sheet style mattress pad for my bed and it is always slipping off and is noisy and I think it makes me sweat. I don't think I will have any of those problems with this cover. Very pleased with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Meri Badran

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! This does not protect your mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This mattress protector is the biggest piece of crap I have purchased on Amazon in a long time. It is much bigger then my slightly larger king size mattress. That causes the protector to slide everywhere under the sheets. It also does not protect your mattress from liquid damage. Essentially making this a piece of junk that wraps around your mattress for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love IT❤
customer_reviews.text: I got this because like many others, I am a mess. Spilling things happen allot at my house. It was easy to install and have already removed and washed it. The velcro stayed put and the zipper is sturdy. On another note. My daughter had a friend sleep over and we found out later that she had bed bugs in her home. I am thankful now that I had this on my bed and getting more for my kids bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Made a used mattress brand new
customer_reviews.text: We got a very expensive Simmons pillow top mattress free with a bed set on Craigslist. But, who wants to sleep on someone's old mattress? So I sprayed the top of the mattress down with a bleach cleaner and let that dry. Then I installed this mattress encasement. It was easier to install than I thought. It is like a new mattress. Probably saved me close to $2,000. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: GJbean

customer_reviews.title: This product does not last and once you know it’s too late.
customer_reviews.text: WATER PROOF IS NOT LONG TERM. Brought this product based on reviews. I have used this product and just took it off my sons bed. I’m so sad. The waterproof material must be sprayed on and peeled off. The new mattress that was put in this is now ruined. Urine spots everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Asher Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Protects mattress 100%
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this on our front porch swing bed. A few weeks ago, a feline with a desire to mark his territory decided to spray the swing bed’s mattress. Well, this cover protected our mattress from being forever ruined by cat urine. Not a single drop penetrated the cover. We simply put the top sheet and the cover in the wash, and were back in business when the mattress cover finally dried. Since it can’t go in the dryer and is so water repellent, water sat on it for days, so it does take a while to dry after a wash. If you need absolute protection for a mattress, this cover is it!
customer_reviews.author: paperbackvacation

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof, discovered this past weekend. Liquid soaked right through to the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This protector does exactly what it says it does. It provides full coverage and protection for your mattress. It fits perfectly on my full sized mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Evans

customer_reviews.title: Is it really waterproof ???
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed with the product. While it is mentioned as, water proof, but it dint do the duty in our case. Water spilled and mattress is fully wet. It is a great disappointment to see that one of the basic specification mentioned has failed. It's been 6months that we purchased it. So neither can return nor ask for an exchange. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Praneeth K Thaduvai

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely hate this and will be buying a different one
customer_reviews.text: I abhor sleeping on this thing, it's like sleeping on plastic and I wake up in a sweat all the time. Plus it came "new" but with a stain on one spot. I didn't open it for some time because we decided we were going to buy a new mattress and I put it aside til we did a few months or so later. Would absolutely have returned it if we had tried it right away. It seems like it probably would be good for spills or bedbugs but don't know for sure and haven't spilled anything yet. Probably the only good thing about this is that it actually fits (albeit tightly) over our ridiculously tall/thick Purple .3 mattress
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Helped my situation a lot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after we moved into a new apartment that had bed bugs. I credit this mattress protector as the main reason I was able to get rid of them. I was spraying and cleaning every day but it seemed like there were always still a couple lingering around. Once I threw this on my mattress, I immediately felt like I had finally got rid of them. It's been over 6 months since and I've never had to deal with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping! Bit warm though
customer_reviews.text: Talk about fast shipping! Ordered on Friday during my lunch break and it showed up Saturday! It wasn’t supposed to come until Tuesday. It fits very loose on my bed but I think it’s designed so a pillow top mattress can fit in it but I don’t have a pillow top. It allows me to add another foam layer in so that makes me happy. The only thing that I don’t like is, it gives the heat back that the body gives off and becomes incredibly warm. As a person who likes to sleep cold I don’t like it but it has to be that way for the product to work. Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynz H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product to give you peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought a king sized mattress encasement as well as 2 twin sized mattress encasements. They are all a bit big for our mattresses because they give extra room in case of pillow-top mattresses or extra thick mattresses. This does not affect the mattresses in any negative way. In fact, when we put them on our girls' beds they had a fun time 'deflating the bubble' of air that was trapped in the encasement. This made me feel good that the seal was so good that there was air trapped inside. The air did end up coming out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Water proof and silent!
customer_reviews.text: I have a child who occasionally still wets the bed. Yet he has friends over often and didn't want them to know he had plastic on his mattress. We have used other brands and they were so noisy and embarrassing to a ten year old child. If you sat on his bed you would hear the mattress covers. Even with a sheet/blanket over it. This is great. He's confident and even though he's basically out grown the issue, it's so much better for us parents to know if there ever is an unexpected accident again, we don't need to buy a whole new mattress all over again.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeMommies

customer_reviews.title: As few months in, seems durable so far. Nice. No off-gassing smell.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it a few months. So far it's tough and durable. Good quality. If that changes I'll come back and update by review. This is not a slip that just goes over the top, your mattress is completely sealed inside it. Zipped. Major protection. I got a used mattress in really good condition from someone but it had a strange perfumey, and slightly hotel kind of scent. I can't smell it at all in this thing :) and the cover itself didn't have a plastic smell as some synthetic products sometimes do. Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: J. Casey Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These mattress pads are nice and easy to put on, but they are far from waterproof. The whole reason we purchased them was because our daughter is potty training. Her first accident leaked right through. I frantically looked up my order history to make sure I did, in fact, order waterproof covers, and the packaging clearly says it is. We bought one for our bed and hers and will now need to purchase 2 new ones.....
customer_reviews.author: Willow Rose MacQuaid

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: We are potty training. One accident on this baby and the mattress is wet! I’m sad because the material feels so nice and I had high hopes. It was easy to get on the mattress because the material is so silky. Zipper and closure were easy to move around. Seems like it would fit a thicker mattress too. I washed it before use with Costco detergent, no fabric softener, tumble dried according to instructions, so I don’t think I can return it either. Can’t comment on durability because we only used it a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This is the third time I've purchased a bed cover for a family member, and it is not only the best made, but it's also the lowest price cover I've found. I was concerned about the fact it is cheaper then the others I've purchased. I figured here we go again, either it will be so thin it would tear during installation or after you've slept on it, but instead I've found the BEST one by far. It is loose on the bed since the bed isn't a pillow top but it was easy to install and soft to the touch.....I would recommend buying the product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: grannydx

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Bedbug Proof
customer_reviews.text: Soft, not crinkly, this waterproof, bedbug proof, zippered mattress encasement also helps protect from dust mite allergies. It will fit a fairly thick mattress. It may feel too warm to sleep on with just a sheet over it. Rather, place a cotton mattress pad over it, then the bottom sheet. This mattress encasement seems well-made, but plan is to update this review if it doesn't wear well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Northern SW

customer_reviews.title: Better than others in the market for sure! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover to prevent bed bugs and protect mattress. I appreciate this most because it gives me peace of mind! But what makes this particular product better than others on market is it is very soft feeling! Doesn’t feel like you’re wallering around on noisy tarp or plastic! It was also extremely easy to put on! Comfortable for sure. Only con is that I have a queen size bed and the protector is actually a little big for it. Sometimes “air bubbles” will come up on the bed across from where one sits down. But it’s no problem at all. Just used your hand and press it down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. Easy to put on the mattress, fit great (extra roomy so no worries if you have a mattress topper or extra plush mattress), and is not a cheap quality material. I was worried a "waterproof" cover would feel or sound plastic-y but it doesn't. We don't hear or feel it at all under our sheets. As a breastfeeding mom of an infant, this has given me lots of peace of mind and has protected our mattress from all kinds of spills, spit-ups, breast leaks, and baby poosplosions. Love it and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This fits our 12” memory foam mattress very well. There was a little extra room, but not so much that it made the bed look sloppy. It was easy to put it on our king sized mattress, though it did take 2 of us. The material feels more like a sheet which I like. Our previous mattress protector was vinyl and I hated the sound it made. This one seems to be a nicer material but there’s definitely a water proof layer beneath it. We haven’t tested the waterproof feature yet, but I plan to test it out soon to see how it holds up. If it doesn’t keep the mattress dry, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Fits our 13” mattress with 3” mattress topper!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I brought this for our king mattress. Initially we put it on our king mattress and it fit. It was a bit loose but we didn’t mind. What really made me write the review was the fact that it fit like a glove after we put a 3 inch thick mattress topper on top. I like this cover a lot and really think you’ll enjoy protecting your investment. It’s definitely easier to put on with two people. Would recommend if you’re moving and want to protect your mattress as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but effective
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put on my mattress but it's kind of stiff and a little loud. But hey, if it protects my mattress from bugs, then what's a little noise right? Idk I hope it gets quieter over time
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Not Breathable and Uncomfortable Fabric
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install. I am sure it is effective in terms of waterproofing and protecting from allergens/ bedbugs. However, it not only made sleeping in the new incredibly hot but also the fabric of mattress protector was very uncomfortable and very noticeable even under a sheet. We had to buy a $200 mattress pad for on top to make the bed breathable and comfortable again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof, or even water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Kept my memory foam fold up mattress in this to try to keep it protected when I travel. My cooler leaked a bit of water into the car near the mattress and it soaked it up right through this cover. Now the mattress smells like mold. Find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Jahnke

customer_reviews.title: Ok mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a twin sized cover. It's very saggy because it's made for a deeper mattress (mine is 10 inches). I wish the sides had some type of elasticity so that it wasn't so saggy/baggy. There is nothing in the seller's description (or any of the reviews that I read)to tell you that you will need help to install this cover. I did it on my own but getting it zipped was a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stariha

customer_reviews.title: Sleep peacefully totally protected from possible bugs
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, not noisy like plastic ones. Hubby had bites, not sure what. Tore bed & room apart&vacuumed-no bed bug evidence but lots of dust behind bed. Immediately ordered this totally sealed zipper&velcro pc. covers zip pull. Reasonably priced, 10 year warranty. Peace of mind for a good night's rest. Very fast delivery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but super noisy!
customer_reviews.text: The encasing has worked great. We recently purchased a new mattress and I have spilled a couple times. The encasing did its job and keep the stains out! BUT... The reason that I’m removing a star is because it’s loud. My boyfriend tosses and turns and I can hear him at night. Ideally you would want place something on top of it or else you’ll be hearing each movement at night
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof as stated
customer_reviews.text: Well the main purpose in buying this was to protect my son’s new linenspa mattress from possible bed bugs (from mattress reviews & bed wetting) His first accident destroyed his new mattress. I am very upset because this product claims to be waterproof. It’s not any cheaper than other brands out there either. I can understand if this was a 10.00 product but it wasn’t. I expected it to be waterproof & trusted this product to protect the brand new mattress. I will not buy again. Beware if this is the main reason this cover is desired (waterproof protection) it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: No Crinkle Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to cover a king size mattress topper that we put in our rooftop tent (RTT). It was easy enough to put it on the topper even though I was wrestling with it in the RTT. In hindsight, it probably would’ve been easier with another person. The cover feels really nice and it’s not crinkly which is what comes to mind when I think of waterproof mattress covers. Anyway, I can’t speak to it covering a king size mattress but it works nicely for the topper (there is extra bagginess).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: No odd smell, came on time, Soft and comfortable. I believe it is keeping bugs away, have not seen any of them since I put it on. It took me a while though to figure out how to put it on. Most mattress covers fit on short end, then pull it down to zip around other end. However, this one when I finally figuired it out fits around the longer part of mattress side. I don't believe their were any instructions to explain this or I just didn't see them. But it is still a great buy! Sheets stay on top of it great also. So I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product-easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of putting the covers on my mattress and box spring. I am an older female adult and I was able to manage the job by myself. The material was soft and the zipper has a Velcro piece that covers the zipper tab, so that it won’t come unzipped and nothing can get in or out. So far it’s doing a great job as I had a bedbug or two that kept coming out at night bitting me and I haven’t had a problem since the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Harris

customer_reviews.title: HUGE for a full size memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is HUGE of my daughter’s full size memory foam Serra mattress. It has so much extra material hanging off of it that I was certain that I accidentally ordered the wrong size. After double-checking, it does say Full Size on the package, but it’s way too big! It has held up after one washing in the washing machine and going through the dryer. It has been water proof so far when my daughter had an accident, so it is doing it’s job! I just wish it was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: natmillert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping mattress
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a nice camping mattress, so I wanted to find a way to protect it from the elements. I bought this mattress encasement and was very pleasantly surprised with the quality. The waterproofing is on the inside, and the outside is a soft fabric that feels just like a bedsheet. It is not at all crinkly. It is thick, feels very well-constructed, has velcro, and was comfortable all week. I can't speak to the waterproofing of the protector because it didn't come into contact with any liquids. However, it definitely seems like it would be more protective than a regular mattress cover. The thickness alone would probably prevent most stains.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyneth

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is quiet. I read other reviews that said they had problems with leakage, but I literally ran water from the faucet on the protector before I used it and there was no problem. I put it on a twin mattress by myself, and it works fine, but for a larger mattress it would probably be helpful to have two people. Some mattress protectors can be very crinkly when in use, but this is very quiet and I can't hear it once installed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mixed Blessings

customer_reviews.title: No smell, easy to put on, well made
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. Easy to put on. Using for mattresses/beds at our summer home which has 13 beds... so im well aquainted with putting them on. Was able to do it alone on the twin beds but if you have larger beds you need a hand getting them inplace. No smell. Will update after using for the summer as to durability.
customer_reviews.author: BREATH2

customer_reviews.title: It works for the price
customer_reviews.text: First, Very happy with the price ,its very cheap, I didn’t test if it’s waterproof I’m sure it is... I like that it’s easy to put on the mattress .. the only thing that bothers me is that the material is noisy... I guess because it’s cheaply made...
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Seems great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we’ve purchased for two different beds. It seems well made and it was easy to put on. Hopefully it will protect as it is supposed to against spills etc but we haven’t gotten the beds wet so don’t know how waterproof it really is. It’s quiet though, doesn’t sound crunchy or make noise when you shift or move in the bed and we have our fitted sheets directly on top, no mattress pad or topper, because the mattresses are foam.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: My oldest still wets her bed and we've got through 4 different mattress protectors and I came across this one. We've had it since April and its been the only one that really has been water resistant, and durable enough to handle her tossing and turning. It doesn't dry very well in the dryer but we will hang dry it as well and that seems to do the trick. You need help slipping it on to the mattress because when you zip it up it holds a lot of air in there but other than that, i'll be buying a couple more of these.
customer_reviews.author: KatesPrime1

customer_reviews.title: Airtight and superior protection
customer_reviews.text: When I put this around my mattress, there was an air bubble stuck inside the encasement. It took me about two days to totally get this air bubble out and have the level. Even after I unzipped the encasement to partially take the cover off the mattress it was still difficult to get all of the air out. It's been my experience that if it's hard to get air out then It's going to be pretty hard for anything to get in which is exactly what I need. Superior protection for the price and extends the life of my mattress. A win win situation!
customer_reviews.author: Helpme Helputoo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Concerns
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these. The first was as advertised and went onto the bed with no problem. However, the second set contained what looked to be many short curly hairs and a reddish orange stain. Gross. We have returned for a refund and replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: The older I get the worse my allergies seem to bother me. I'm down to every last desperate measure to minimize the sneezing and and other discomforts that common allergies seem to exaggerate themselves in my small apartment. Time will tell, but as far as build this seems to be holding up as I have changed out my sheets dozens of times over with no signs of any wear or damage to the cover. And I'm not known for my gentle sleep, I toss around like a beached whale.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Airtight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this mattress cover. First, after zipping it up and laying it down, there was a giant air bubble in the top! Obviously airtight in a noticeable way. Second, we were concerned about reviews discussing noise coming from the mattress, but we - or rather our daughters - haven't noticed anything of the sort. In fact, it seems softer than our last waterproof cover. Great cover, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Haon the GreatTop Contributor: Chess

customer_reviews.title: Not bed bug proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have bed bugs in my mattress. I bombed the room then after put the encasement on. My bed and all sheets/blankets are off the floor, with bed bug traps under the legs of my bed. They are somehow still getting through the encasement from my mattress up to where me and my dogs are.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mills

customer_reviews.title: Protects against liquids?! Yeah right!? Not even a little!!
customer_reviews.text: Little bit, scratch that lotta bit upset. Does it say that it protects against fluids and liquids? Yes Did it protect against fluids and liquids? No. Cat peed on the bed 5 days after putting it on and it's soaked all the way through. I only got this one specifically because it didn't just protect against bed bugs, it said it protected against liquids and fluids! Now my purple bed has pee seeped into it, and if anybody's familiar with purple beds you might understand why that kind of sucks. Would never purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: Makes you HOT. When first laying on mattress it balloons up because it's encased
customer_reviews.text: Mismatched actor does what it is supposed to however because it's not as breathable it inflates like a giant balloon when you lay on the mattress.(boarderline like a trampoline). But the actual worst part is it makes it almost impossible to sleep regularly. It's incredibly hot to sleep on. Where I am now it's been snowing and below freezing for the better part of two weeks. Even with my window open and it averaging around 60 degrees in the house it's still sleeps incredibly hot and sticky
customer_reviews.author: T. Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole in the seam like it wasn't sewn correctly that I didn't notice until I put it all the way on my mattress!!!!. I put it on my mattress then as I was about to put my sheet on discovered the whole corner area had an area where the seam wasn't lined up correctly when it was sewn so there was a gap causing a hole. =( It looked like it would have been nice if it hadn't been for that defect. The material looked like good material.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Soft- Need 2 people to put on
customer_reviews.text: Very soft when taken right out of the package. Struggled with the fitting and wrapping it around the Queen sized mattress. After wrestling for about 5-10 minutes we had it. Fit like a glove. Haven’t had any spills or incidents to test the durability, but the fit and material have me thinking it’s pretty secure. Haven’t washed yet either, so can’t rate the “easy to clean” scale. Seems extremely white- so bleach is most likely recommended? 1YR: has one stain from a spill but it protected the mattress perfectly. Only stained the mattress pad- did not soak through.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Draper Spellman

customer_reviews.title: This has been great with our memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Got this twin size cover to go on our daughter's new memory foam mattress, to help increase the longevity of it. It wasn't much of a hassle to get it on (I was afraid of it being difficult with the floppy mattress). So far, the mattress underneath has withstood some snack and drink spills without any impact. If this thing wears thin at some point, we'd get another of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality but we'll see after two years
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was easy to install even with only me doing it though it would've been easier with two people to do it. Depends on how heavy your mattress is and if you can lift it up to put the encasement around it. Hasn't torn with cat but I imagine it will if cat scratches too much but I solved this by putting microfiber sheets on bed so the cat can't pull the fibers apart with claws.
customer_reviews.author: Cool

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! I am 5’2 and have a king size mattress. I put this on myself. It is super easy! Just lean the mattress against a wall vertically and use a chair to stand on to put the opening over the top of the mattress. Shimmy it down on both ends about half way down the mattress and then lay it down flat. Pull the rest down and then zip it up. It looks and feels great! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to put on a queen mattress (we had 2 people but it was still easy); however reviews said it was quiet...we didn't find it quiet so had to get a cotton mattress cover to place over it and that helped. I couldn't rate durability or water resistance as I didn't have experience with either. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Better in the trash than on the bed!
customer_reviews.text: I kept this on my bed until I couldn’t stand it anymore. It would be great if you had bedbugs I guess but it is pretty bad otherwise. The seams twisted, it was slick and I couldn’t keep bed sheets on. It made a swishy aggravating noise when you moved. I took it off, threw it in the trash and my only regret is that I didn’t do it sooner. My bed is so much more comfortable without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Zippered Mattress Encasement - Waterproof Mattress Protector (Queen)
feature_bullets: MATTRESS ENCASEMENT - Fits Queen size mattress perfectly with dimensions 60 inches by 80 inches; 15 inches deep pocket

KNITTED POLYESTER FABRIC - Stretchable knitted polyester fabric fits the mattress easily and gives a comfortable feel while you sleep; PVC waterproof TPU backing on all sides resist any leakage into the mattress
ZIPPERED COVER - Zippered cover with zip guard secures the mattress from 360 degrees; it protects the mattress from bedbugs, dust mites
OEKO-TEX CERTIFIED - Oeko-Tex Standard 100 factory certification ensures that the fabric meets the safety and environmental standards
EASY CARE - Machine washable; tumble dry for easy maintenance; Note: Packaging might slightly vary

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars17,254 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
